entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:24 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -30.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 09:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -30.8°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -34.8°C
Wind: W 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then light late this afternoon. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 56 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
